about_the_game:
Welcome to Mokete, where intergalactic adventure awaits you on Earth!

In Mokete, you'll take on the role of the courageous alien protagonist in a world filled with wonders and challenges on Earth. This turn-based roguelike-style game will lead you into an exciting tournament on our very own planet, where aliens use abducted animals as their battle companions in spectacular battles.

Your alien, will need to explore different areas of Earth, each with its own environment and unique challenges. Your mission is to train the abducted animals you encounter in capsules throughout your journey and use their special abilities in thrilling turn-based battles against other aliens. The ultimate goal is to defeat the zone champion, who typically possesses a mythical being of great power.

Earth in Mokete is a place full of surprises and secrets to uncover. From deep jungles to bustling cities, you'll immerse yourself in an unforgettable adventure as you face challenges, meet quirky characters, and embark on exciting quests.

Do you have what it takes to guide your alien to victory in this intergalactic tournament on Earth? Get ready to explore, battle, and make new friends as you journey towards glory in Mokete. Let the adventure on Earth begin!

name: Mokete

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-760 (4 * 2800); AMD Athlon II X4 645 AM3 (4 * 3100)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Mokete is a turn-based roguelike game with cartoon graphics and an alien theme. You'll take control of a brave alien who uses abducted animals in thrilling battles on Earth to become the zone champion and face mythical beings.
